job_summary: Job description, responsibilites, requirements, benefits of Senior Consultant Test Management (m/w/d) Senior On-site Full-timeknowing languages English, German located in Vienna, Austria knowing following skills Test Planning, Test Execution, Test Automation, Test Case Design, Requirements Analysis, Quality Assurance, Risk Management, Defect Tracking, Test Metrics, Process Improvement with gross salary 60000 per year
job_description:
Job Description:

The Senior Consultant Test Management (m/w/d) is responsible for providing test management services to clients in Vienna, Austria. The Senior Consultant will be responsible for planning, executing, and automating tests, designing test cases, analyzing requirements, ensuring quality assurance, managing risks, tracking defects, and improving processes.

Responsibilities:

• Plan, execute, and automate tests
• Design test cases
• Analyze requirements
• Ensure quality assurance
• Manage risks
• Track defects
• Improve processes
• Provide test management services to clients

Requirements:
• Fluency in English and German
• Experience in test planning, test execution, test automation, test case design, requirements analysis, quality assurance, risk management, defect tracking, and process improvement
• Ability to work on-site in Vienna, Austria

Benefits:
• Gross salary of 60000 per year

job_description:
Job Description:

The Senior Consultant Test Management (m/w/d) is responsible for providing test management services to clients in Vienna, Austria. The Senior Consultant will be responsible for planning, executing, and automating tests, designing test cases, analyzing requirements, ensuring quality assurance, managing risks, tracking defects, and improving processes.

Responsibilities:

• Develop and maintain test plans, test cases, and test scripts

• Execute tests and analyze results
• Automate tests using appropriate tools
• Design and implement test strategies
• Analyze requirements and identify test scenarios
• Monitor and track defects
• Ensure quality assurance of products
• Manage risks associated with testing
• Generate test metrics and reports
• Identify and implement process improvements

Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
• At least 5 years of experience in test management
• Proficiency in English and German
• Knowledge of test planning, test execution, test automation, test case design, requirements analysis, quality assurance, risk management, defect tracking, and test metrics
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team
• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

Benefits:
• Competitive salary of €60,000 per year
• Comprehensive health insurance
• Paid vacation and sick leave
• Professional development opportunities
